name: Giratina Origin Forme
description: The Renegade Pokémon. A Pokémon that is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours. It appears in an ancient cemetery.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to ground moves.

abilities.name: Form Change (Giratina)
abilities.description: Giratina's default form is Altered Forme. When it is given a Griseous Orb to hold, or any time it is in its home plane, the Distortion World, it takes on the Origin Forme.
